ekatas ubhatas ca iva
loka paṇṇatti vajjataḥ
yaḥ sa jāyati vimati
parivārena chijjati
cakkavatti mahāsene
miga majjhā iva kesari
ravi rasi parikkiṇṇaḥ
cando tāra gaṇe yathā
brahmā brahmaparisāya
gaṇa majjhā iva nāyakaḥ
evam saddhamma vinayaḥ
parivārena sobhati iti
